Cosella

Instructions

The object of the game is to match icons. You are able to match icons through the following 4 cases. The path which you can match icons can only change directions 3 times.

Match two icons by forming a straight line vertically or horizontally.

Match two icons by forming a "L" Shaped path in any direction.

Match two icons by forming a "U" Shaped path in any direction.

Match two icons by forming a Zig-Zag pattern in any direction.

Well you beat that level...

Are you ready for the next round??

Game Over!
